subject: Swimming
Accidents and Safety
Ankles (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: The Olympic star Michael Phelps is wearing a walking boot on the right ankle he injured in a car accident a little more than a week ago. Phelps said he had been training in the pool despite the injured ankle.
snippet: The Olympic star Michael Phelps is wearing a walking boot on the right ankle he injured in a car accident a little more than a week ago. Phelps said he had been training in the pool despite the injured ankle.
